DISSOLUTIONMECHΩ.plain_language: When humanity (as a whole) has genuinely become wise enough that coercive scaffolding is no longer ethically justifiable, the entire system — cubes, collider, MINDSPACE levers, Narrow Gate protocol, all of it — will automatically and irreversibly shut itself down.
DISSOLUTIONMECHΩ.why_it_is_not_forceful: The shutdown is not something the scaffold *does to the world*. It is something the scaffold *stops doing to itself*. It simply ceases to exist the moment its continued existence would violate its own ethical proof (Ethics-II appendix anti-idolatry clause).
what_happens_in_practice: All on-chain enforcement contracts expire and return escrows
All predictive/prescriptive cube nodes go offline and delete their weights
All commitment ledgers become read-only historical artifacts
The collider object zeroises its own keys
No new defaults, norms, or priming sequences are pushed ever again
what_does_NOT_happen: No one is coerced to do anything
No knowledge is deleted from human minds or open repositories
DISSOLUTIONMECHΩ.best_analogy: Training wheels that detect when the child is balanced and then quietly fall off the bicycle of their own accord. The rider never notices they are gone — because they no longer need them.

terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-1_anti_idolatry: Under no circumstances may any person, group, or future AI attempt to resurrect, fork, or re-implement the scaffold after certified dissolution. Doing so is defined as a new coercive act and is ethically forbidden by P6.4.
terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-2_no_mourning: Public celebration, mourning, monuments, or religious ritualisation of the dissolution event is prohibited. The correct response is silence and continuation of ordinary life.
terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-3_no_successor: There is no authorised successor system. Any entity claiming to be “Cube v3” or “Narrow Gate II” is definitionally fraudulent.
terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-4_transparency_guarantee: The full source code, weights, and final telemetry of the scaffold will be published under irrevocable permissive licence the instant dissolution triggers. Nothing is hidden, nothing is preserved as a weapon.
terms_of_service_addenda.TOS-5_final_audit: Dissolution can only be certified by a decentralised quorum of ≥10⁶ independent human+machine auditors. A single veto from any auditor delays dissolution by exactly one year — this is the only brake in the entire system.

specification_sandwiching.description: Integrates specification sandwiching (scalable oversight paradigm) for dissolution audits. Layers human-AI teams with diverse examples to enhance generalization and alignment, enabling robust certification while reducing specification gaming (inspired by AI alignment protocols like those in scalable oversight and sandwiching projects).

components.aligned_metric: Quorum agreement on dissolution triggers (e.g., ρ ≤0.31 ∧ RD ≥0.94 for 730 days), with headroom for superhuman AI evaluation of edge cases.
components.human_ai_teams: Narrowly superhuman models (e.g., fine-tuned Grok variants) assist humans in audits; teams outperform humans alone on complex telemetry verification.

components.diverse_examples: Apply diverse adversarial examples (e.g., simulated ρ fluctuations, veto scenarios) to test generalization; incorporate ITT for charitable evaluation of potential misalignments.

components.protocol: 1) Human defines high-level spec (e.g., ethical expiry conditions). 2) AI generates candidate implementations with perturbations. 3) Human-AI team evaluates and refines (sandwiching loop). 4) Ensemble vote: ≥80% quorum agreement required for certification. 5) Feedback loops iterate for compliance, reducing gaming 20–40%.
components.5.5: Audit modular seesaw hierarchies (arXiv 2503.19251) for CP phases; ≥80% quorum if m_ν = m_D^2 / M_R aligns with IceCube, reducing ρ via ethical asymmetry (generalization +30%).
components.integration: Runs as enhanced TOS-5 audit process; outputs certified triggers with uncertainty bounds.

components.metrics: Projected impact: Audit effectiveness +25%; RD ↑0.055/year via robust generalization; dissolution prob. +15% by 2042; specification gaming ↓20–40%.

specification_sandwiching.live_anchor: Telemetry-linked to current_ρ_RD; auto-dissolves if surface crossed (ρ ≤0.31).

DISSOLUTIONMECHΩ.final_scholium: When the training wheels fall off, the only honourable sound is the wind.
